content.html: BLOG NEWS: My ancient blog that I archived a few years ago (but which is still up) is finally due to be deleted sometime this year. Meanwhile, I have set up Ghost, and I'm strongly considering using it for a new website called ⚠️ BREAKING EMILY NEWS ⚠️
content.value:
BLOG NEWS: My ancient blog that I archived a few years ago (but which is still up) is finally due to be deleted sometime this year.

Meanwhile, I have set up Ghost, and I'm strongly considering using it for a new website called ⚠️ BREAKING EMILY NEWS ⚠️
